options.content:
### Version
Different colours ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ¨ðŸŸ¦ are different versions.

Move a cursor ðŸ‘†to the head of the line to get version info.

targets.expr:
100 * (
  ( 100 * process_cpu_load{  instance=~"$instance" } )
  -
  ( 100 * process_cpu_load{  instance=~"$instance" } offset ${offset} )
)
/
( round( 100 * process_cpu_load{  instance=~"$instance" } offset ${offset} , 0.0001) != 0 )

100 * (
  ( 100 * process_cpu_load{  instance=~"$instance" } )
  -
  ( 100 * process_cpu_load{  instance=~"$instance" } offset ${offset} )
)
/
( round( 100 * process_cpu_load{  instance=~"$instance" } offset ${offset} , 0.0001) != 0 )

panels.title: ðŸ§® CPU % (ðŸŸ¥ current vs ðŸŸ¦ prev)

targets.expr:
100 * (
  ( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__rate_interval])) )
  -
  ( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset})) )
)
/
( round( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset})) , 0.0001) != 0 )

100 * (
  ( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__rate_interval])) )
  -
  ( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset})) )
)
/
( round( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset})) , 0.0001) != 0 )
